item.title: Offline Go Modules
item.description: golang offline module dependencies download Using go mod vendor 0 - With an existing module copy go.mod and go.sum files from the offline PC to the internet PC 0bis - New module create a folder on the internet PC create a go module : go mod init test 1 - Download dependencies via vendor folder create a offline_modules.go file : package offline_modules func main() {} add the dependencies you want to download (use _) : package offline_modules import ( _ "github.
